basics.name: Dave D. Bagtas
basics.label: Software Engineer / Website Developer
basics.summary: Computer Scientist college graduate of 2009, mainly a software engineer and a website developer (make it happen kind of guy, do improvise or research if need be), does code reviews on interesting projects at GitHub on spare time; also delves into operating system internals and a bit of malware analysis, currently a Linux platform developer (FOSS ROCKS!!!), looking for Entry / Mid level ASP.NET C# or Angular Front-end coding jobs.

education.institution: EASTWOODS Professional College, Balanga City, Bataan

highlights: Develop and maintain SQL scripts for cinema reporting sub-systems.
Also write code cinema software based on Delphi 7.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
